changelog.title: Web Version July 4 2021
changes: Update Game section to allow changing games back and for without having to refresh and loose previously loaded content and position, now the app will always remember the content and position of a game that you have open before (For Live, Clips and VOD), until you refresh or the app auto refreshes (if 'Auto refresh in background' is enable in setting -> Content customization's ...)

Web Version June 21 2021
changes: Add support for Twitch animated emotes
